name: Evermoon
storyline:
The power has been passed on to the selected individual through the tribe's sacred ritual that happens once every 100 years. The fractions of power found by Nakamatos are kept in the tribe's pantheon.

The daughter of Adelard, the King of Nakamatos, is trained in battle by the kingdom’s knight to pass the test of obtaining power from the piece of De-Zentrum. Ten years later, she engaged in the test of skills for De-Zentrum's powers; after successfully gaining the power, she became Everguard – which is a group that received power to protect their people.
summary: Evermoon is the world's first Epic 5v5 Multiplayer Online Battle Arena (MOBA) three-lanes PVP game that offers a sustainable Free-To-Play and Play-And-Earn multiplayer economy with NFT features!
